item.description:
There will be live Irish music all day long and because it's outside of the city it won't be very expensive to drink/eat.

We're starting early and we'll be there for as long as we can stand...all in the name of Sainthood and the color green, of course.

Come join us...this is our club's ultimate holiday!!!
item.how_to_find_us: Contact us via comment/email if you have any questions
item.why: It is imperative to celebrate good old St. Patrick with people who appreciate alcohol as much as you do!
item.name: Come celebrate St. Patrick's Day!
